prInfo.title: ðŸ”§ CRO Fix: Detected issue: Hero contrast issues
prInfo.description:
## Summary
Detected issue: Hero contrast issues

## Expected Impact
+30% CTA visibility, -15% dead clicks

## Changes
- **hero.backgroundColor**: `"#18181b"` â†’ `"#1F2937"`
- **hero.cta**: `{"text":"Shop Collection","color":"#3b82f6","textColor":"#ffffff","position":"inside-hero","size":"large"}` â†’ `{"text":"Explore Collection","color":"#F59E0B","textColor":"#000000","position":"inside-hero","size":"large"}`

## Rationale
Based on analysis of user behavior, we recommend this minimal, targeted fix to address the hero contrast issues issue.

---

items.name: Classic Heavyweight Hoodie
items.description: Our signature heavyweight hoodie features a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and a cozy kangaroo pocket. Double-stitched seams ensure durability while the brushed fleece interior provides maximum comfort.
items.materials: 100% organic cotton, 400 GSM heavyweight fleece. Pre-shrunk and garment-dyed for a lived-in feel.

items.name: Essential Cotton Tee
items.description: The perfect everyday tee with a slightly oversized fit. Features a ribbed crew neck and reinforced shoulder seams for lasting comfort and shape retention.
items.materials: 100% premium cotton, 180 GSM. Enzyme-washed for softness.

items.name: Relaxed Fit Joggers
items.description: Designed for all-day comfort, these joggers feature a tapered leg, elastic waistband with drawcord, and deep side pockets. Perfect for lounging or light activity.
items.materials: 80% cotton, 20% polyester French terry. Soft-brushed interior.

items.name: Oversized Crewneck
items.description: A wardrobe staple with a modern oversized silhouette. Features a ribbed collar, cuffs, and hem with a relaxed drop-shoulder design for effortless style.
items.materials: 100% organic cotton, 350 GSM midweight fleece. Garment-washed.

items.quote: The quality is unmatched. I've bought from dozens of brands and nothing compares to the weight and feel of these pieces.
items.author: Alex T.

items.quote: Finally found my go-to brand. The fit is perfect and they actually last through hundreds of washes.
items.author: Jordan M.

items.quote: Worth every penny. The attention to detail is incredible - from the stitching to the fabric choice.
items.author: Sam K.

prInfo.title: ðŸ”§ CRO Fix: Detected issue: Low CTA visibility
prInfo.description:
## Summary
Detected issue: Low CTA visibility

## Expected Impact
+15-25% CTA click rate

## Changes
- **hero.cta**: `{"text":"Shop Now","color":"#6B7280","textColor":"#FFFFFF","position":"inside-hero","size":"small"}` â†’ `{"text":"Shop Now - Free Shipping","color":"#10B981","textColor":"#FFFFFF","position":"inside-hero","size":"large"}`

## Rationale
Based on analysis of user behavior, we recommend this minimal, targeted fix to address the low cta visibility issue.

---
